attributes.action: ban rotweilers dogs to be kept as pets in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Through out the last few years,children have been put in danger when rotweiler dogs have been placed in their presents. Rotweilers should not have a place in society other than security. Aggression comes so naturally to these dogs regardless if the owners have treated the dogs well and i am becoming forever concerned regarding the safety of my children as well as others.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
